## textEmphasisVariant

Forces text color and hovering from a parent component.

### Parameters

-   `enableHoverMediaQuery` **[boolean][1]**  (optional, default `defaultProps['$enable-hover-media-query']`)
-   `parent` **[string][2]** 
-   `textColor` **[string][2]** 

Returns **[string][2]**
